attributes.action: reinstate the Stuckist petition demanding that Sir Nicholas Serota not be reappointed director of the Tate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that the Prime Minister has rejected the aforementioned petition on the grounds that it is "potentially libellous, false or defamatory". However it is entirely factual and these grounds are therefore spurious.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
